verses.verse: Thou also, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H3843>tile<s%>, and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and <S%H2710>pourtray<s%> upon it the <S%H5892>city<s%>, even <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>:

And <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> against it, and <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1785>fort<s%> against it, and <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount<s%> against it; <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> also against it, and <S%H7760>set<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> against it round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

Moreover <S%H3947>take<s%> thou unto thee an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4227>pan<s%>, and <S%H5414>set<s%> it for a <S%H7023>wall<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> between thee and the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and <S%H3559>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> against it, and it shall be <S%H4692>besieged<s%>, and thou shalt lay <S%H6696>siege<s%> against it. This shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H7901>Lie<s%> thou also upon thy <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%>, and <S%H7760>lay<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> upon it: according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> upon it thou shalt <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

For I have <S%H5414>laid<s%> upon thee the <S%H8141>years<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: so shalt thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And when thou hast <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> <S%H428>them<s%>, <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H8145>again<s%> on thy <S%H3233%H3227>right<s%> <S%H6654>side<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: I have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> thee each <S%H3117%H3117>day<s%> for a <S%H8141%H8141>year<s%>.

Therefore thou shalt <S%H3559>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4692>siege<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and thine <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be <S%H2834>uncovered<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against it.

And, behold, I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H5688>bands<s%> upon thee, and thou shalt not <S%H2015>turn<s%> thee from one <S%H6654>side<s%> to <S%H6654>another<s%>, till thou hast <S%H3615>ended<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H4692>siege<s%>.

Â¶ <S%H3947>Take<s%> thou also unto thee <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, and <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and <S%H6321>beans<s%>, and <S%H5742>lentiles<s%>, and <S%H1764>millet<s%>, and <S%H3698>fitches<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H3899>bread<s%> thereof, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> upon thy <S%H6654>side<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

And thy <S%H3978>meat<s%> which thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> shall be by <S%H4946>weight<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%>: from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

Thou shalt <S%H8354>drink<s%> also <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure<s%>, the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of an <S%H1969>hin<s%>: from <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6256>time<s%> shalt thou <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> it as <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H5746>bake<s%> it with <S%H1561>dung<s%> that cometh <S%H6627>out<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, in their <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Even thus shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H2931>defiled<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>, whither I will <S%H5080>drive<s%> them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>! behold, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> hath not been <S%H2930>polluted<s%>: for from my <S%H5271>youth<s%> up even till now have I not <S%H398>eaten<s%> of that which dieth of <S%H5038>itself<s%>, or is torn in <S%H2966>pieces<s%>; neither <S%H935>came<s%> there <S%H6292>abominable<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> into my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H7200>Lo<s%>, I have <S%H5414>given<s%> thee <S%H1241>cow's<s%> <S%H6832%H6832>dung<s%> for <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H1561>dung<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> therewith.

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, behold, I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%>, and with <S%H1674>care<s%>; and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure<s%>, and with <S%H8078>astonishment<s%>:

That they may <S%H2637>want<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water<s%>, and be <S%H8074>astonied<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another<s%>, and consume <S%H4743>away<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.
